explanation: The first-aid kit is crucial for treating injuries, preventing infections, and managing health emergencies, all of which are especially critical in the extreme conditions of the Atacama Desert. Given the harsh environment and high risk of health issues such as heatstroke and dehydration, having the ability to provide immediate medical care can be life-saving. Proper first-aid supplies will ensure that minor injuries do not escalate into serious problems, increasing our chances of survival and successful rescue.
